article.Heading: Budget 2016 India: MCX India up 8%; Foreign cos can hike stake in local exchanges
article.Summary: Shares of Multi Commodity Exchange of India (MCX India) rose 8 percent intraday Monday. Finance Minister Arun Jaitley announced that the foreign companies can increase stake in local stock exchanges to 15 percent from 5 percent.
article.Body:
Moneycontrol Bureau

Shares of Multi Commodity Exchange of India (MCX India) rose 8 percent intraday Monday. Finance Minister Arun Jaitley announced that the foreign companies can increase stake in local stock exchanges to 15 percent from 5 percent.

At 13:53 hrs Multi Commodity Exchange of India was quoting at Rs 802.40, up Rs 32.10, or 4.17 percent.
